creditline: Gift of Miss Eileen Bigelow and Mrs. O. H. Ingram, in memory of their mother, Mrs. Alice F. Bigelow, 1965
provenance: Marsden J. Perry (stamp, verso, black: MJP; L. 1880); sold at auction (house?), Stuttgart, Germany, May 22, 1908, cat. 1310, for 205 Mks.; (Private dealer, Rome).   Eileen Bigelow and Mrs. O. H. Ingram; given to MIA, 1965.
title: Man at Desk, Wearing Cross and Chain
